questions_and_notes: What exactly is the difference between this and emico-AERmon?  Should they have different standard_names?  Maybe this one should have standard name: tendency_of_atmosphere_mass_content_of_carbon_monoxide_due_to_anthropogenic_emission
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 1 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
long_name: Total Emission Rate of Anthropogenic CO
